page.title: 19Kennethmont School Part 2.
page.content: {CONT. from page 18 The hall is also used for music lessons, for physical education classes, games and drama productions etc. There are 3 full-time teachers, one for each class and visiting teachers of Art, Home Economics, Drama, Physical Education, Remedial Education and Music as well as instructors for cello and violin who also call once a week. A speech therapist visits the school regularly and there are regular checks on the health of all pupils by the school doctor and the school dentist. Every week the pupils of Primaries 5 to 7 visit Huntly for swimming lessons at the local swimming pool. There is a large playing field adjoining the school where sporting activities are held. Two kitchen staff, a cleaner and a secretary also work at the school.
